Integrated Trip Planning

HOW IT WORKS
1. Activate the Extension: Install the Smart Trip Pin for Chrome.
2. Plan with Ease: Use Google apps to search, book, and manage your trips.
3. Give Back: Each booking contributes to charitable donations through TravelingToGiveâ„¢.

Example Use Cases:

â— Schedule a meeting in Google Calendar, and Smart Trip Pin suggests nearby lodging.
â— Highlight an address on any website to instantly find accommodations.
â— Search for properties near an event location on Events.com Discoverâ„¢.
